name: StarWarsC-3POTranslates
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: c. three p. o. translates
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Need to find the droids you’re looking for but can’t speak alien languages? Look no further. With help from C-3PO and SD-89, you’ll learn key phrases in Shyriiwook, Droidspeak, and more.

When you’re ready, break out your best growls, roars, and beeps as you converse with Chewbacca, R2-D2, BB-8, Bib Fortuna, Wicket, Gardulla the Hutt, and more in their own languages. Just watch what you say, or you may become bantha fodder!

Star Wars: C-3PO Translates! includes phrases and conversations in Shyriiwook and Droidspeak, featuring C-3PO, Chewbacca, R2-D2, BB-8 and more. Additional languages, including Ewokese and Huttese, plus many more phrases and conversations in Shyriiwook and Droidspeak, are available through Amazon Kids+ subscriptions.
